name: Pixel Footy Champs
description:
Football with no limits, no refs, no fouls. Just you and the opponent with 90 seconds of an epic footy war.

Features include:

  • 3 types of weather
  • Customisable teams with up to 225 colours to choose from.
  • Singleplayer mode
  • Two player mode

Coming soon:

  • AI difficulty
  • Challenge mode (1 player and 2 player)
  • In-Game Upgrades / Power ups
  • Quick match mode
  • Sudden death
  • Bug fixes

Pleas e-mail me at PixelSquaresGames@gmail.com for any issues or game ideas.

* Game is still in very early development.

* Game crashes are fixed now.
